content: this is a free pattern for a butterfly check all the details and materials needed in my website here https //zamiguz com/free-crochet-butterfly-pattern/ language english us size 4 10 cm wide x 3 7 5 cm tall without the antennae when you use the recommended materials level of difficulty easy terms of use | copyright all pictures and the pattern contained in this document are the property of zamiguz handmade creations by magna haskell aka maggie this pattern is for personal use only it is prohibited to copy share resell translate publish alter distribute or reproduce the pattern or parts of it in any form online or offline you may sell your handmade items made from my patterns and i would appreciate if you gave credits to zamiguz handmade creations @zamiguz when asked and when sharing your finished items no mass production allowed
